ValidationRule.description: Prevents a user from entering non-number characters into a phone field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Business_Phone__c )), NOT(REGEX( Business_Phone__c , "\\D*?(\\d\\D*?){10}")), ISPICKVAL( Physical_Business_Country__c, "United States of America") ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK( Mobile_Phone__c )), NOT(REGEX( Mobile_Phone__c, "\\D*?(\\d\\D*?){10}")), ISPICKVAL( Physical_Business_Country__c , "United States of America"), Registration__r.RecordType.DeveloperName != "Entertainment_Work" ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Residential_Phone__c )), NOT(REGEX( Residential_Phone__c , "\\D*?(\\d\\D*?){10}")), ISPICKVAL( Residential_Country__c, "United States of America") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a 10-digit phone number with no characters or spaces.
